content: Hello, how has life been treating you lately ?
I am cyber-harrassed by someone I don't know.
I can understand how that could be, I have been in the same situation before, and I' ve had to deal with it a lot. Would you like to talk about what has caused the attack?
They grab a photo of mine and threaten to spread to online.

Wow, that' s really awful. This has become a problem for a lot of people, I can feel how anxious you are right now. Have you tried doing any community work to support people who are having these issues?
